modName: Better Blessing of the Stag Prince
summary: This mod just improves the Blessing of the Stag Prince on the Glass bow of the Stag Prince.
descriptionHtml:
Now the Bow of the Stag Prince has better increments for health and stamina up to 100 for both.
Bonusses are 20->40->60->80->100.
author: MikeW1985

files.name: Glass Bow Of The Stag Prince
files.fileName: Glass Bow Of The Stag Prince-55079-V1.rar
